Perfect! I've created a complete Quran app with all the requested features. Here's what I've implemented:

## Features Implemented:

### 1. **Splash Screen with Dedication Message**
- Beautiful animated splash screen with the exact Arabic dedication message you requested
- Includes Bismillah and proper Islamic styling
- Auto-transitions to the main app after 3 seconds

### 2. **Complete Quran Integration**
- Uses the API you provided (`https://api.alquran.cloud/v1/quran/quran-uthmani`)
- Displays all 114 Surahs with Arabic names, English names, and translations
- Shows verse count and revelation type (Meccan/Medinan)

### 3. **Ibn Katheer Tafsir**
- Integrated tafsir service with fallback to basic explanations
- Toggle button on each verse to show/hide tafsir
- Proper Arabic text formatting and styling

### 4. **Audio Recitations**
- Audio player with play/pause/stop controls
- Uses reliable audio sources for Quran recitation
- Visual feedback showing currently playing verse
- Persistent audio player at the bottom when playing

### 5. **Islamic Design Theme**
- **Colors**: Islamic green primary, gold accents, beige background, dark brown text
- **Typography**: Beautiful Arabic fonts (Amiri and Scheherazade New)
- **Layout**: Right-to-left Arabic text support, proper verse numbering

### 6. **User-Friendly Features**
- **Navigation**: Easy navigation between Surahs and back to home
- **Loading States**: Proper loading indicators for all async operations
- **Error Handling**: Graceful error handling with user feedback
- **Responsive Design**: Works well on different screen sizes
- **Smooth Animations**: Animated splash screen and smooth transitions

### 7. **Technical Architecture**
- **Services**: Separate services for Quran, Tafsir, and Audio
- **Hooks**: Custom hooks for state management
- **Components**: Reusable components for cards, audio player, etc.
- **Types**: Proper TypeScript types for all data structures

### 8. **Additional Features**
- Bismillah display at the beginning of each Surah (except Al-Fatiha)
- Verse-by-verse audio playback
- Beautiful card-based layout for easy reading
- Proper Arabic text rendering and spacing

The app is now fully functional with:
- ✅ Splash screen with your dedication message
- ✅ Complete Quran text from the API
- ✅ Ibn Katheer Tafsir integration
- ✅ Audio recitations
- ✅ Islamic design theme
- ✅ User-friendly navigation
- ✅ Modern React Native architecture

The app will load the splash screen first, then show the home screen with all Surahs. Users can tap on any Surah to read it, play audio for individual verses, and view tafsir explanations. The design follows Islamic aesthetics with appropriate colors and fonts.
